divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side my apartment complex smoking a cigarette,I was looking at the stars,Then out of nowhere a blue tear drop looking,almost like comit,only because it was moving so fast.Suddenly it stoped so smoothly,then it appeared to be a sphere, about nickle size in the sky.It had stoped directly over a field, right in front of the apartment about 30 yards away.I felt very confused,and frightened.The object stayed on for 7 or 8 seconds,Then it looked like it disappeared. Next about 3 or 4 seconds after it turned off. Some object came straight down from where it was, and made a thud, I only seen it for a split second.It was dark,But right where the object went down at was a light post behind it about 15 to 20 yards so i seen it for just a split second right before it hit.It was skiny and long what ever hit the ground.I went back to the apartment right after i seen that.I didn't want to talk about it to my wife or anyone for a while.I Thought aliens and ufo's were fake made up. I thought it was very childesh.It doesn't say anything in the bible about that sort of creations.I wish i never seen that, It hurts me,and my beliefes.It's very depressing and at the same time eye opening.It made me feel like a helpless child.PLEASE SOMEONE EXPLAIN
Summary: Blue oval looked like comit but when it stoped it was a sphere
